CustomField.description: When checked you can have Rollup Helper updates excluded from your select validation rules.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: To enable Rollup Helper updates to be excluded from a Validation Rule add '&& $Setup.rh2__PS_Settings__c.rh2__Run_Validation_Rule__c' at the end of the contents of the Error Condition Formula section of a validation rule.
CustomField.label: Enable Validation Rule Helper
